data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Jiliang, Zhang, Dongxiao, Wei, Xiao, Liu, Haoyu (2017): Cacoplistes (Laminogryllus) brevisparamerus sp. nov., a new species of Cachoplistinae (Orthoptera: Phalangopsidae) from Guangxi, China. Zootaxa 4269 (2): 296-300, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4269.2.8|2 occurrences
